title: Молода
overview: The series is about Olha, a 40-year-old woman who goes through a difficult life change when her husband leaves her for a younger mistress and spends all of the family's savings on gambling. Left with a bunch of debts, Olha is forced to return to work in a publishing house, from which she once refused for the sake of her family. Her life changes dramatically after a chance meeting with 26-year-old Dima, who takes her for his age.
